about_the_game:
Bowling without the bowling ball is both lethal and non-lethal.

With the Arena game you have a bowling score and a game score. Earn bonus shots to use against other targets. The Hillbilly level is expert, and Redneck is an easier level given the number of increased possibilities. There are several targets to hit, and you need to be careful of pets as it will count against you if they get hit. Deer season or rabbit season is earned by hitting tires or silhouettes in the center. The squirrel bag limit increases with the number of shots or replacements. Goose in the wild if you get 3 shots in a row. Choose from different ammo and arrows as well as several pistols, shotguns, a shotgun, a bow, and crossbows. Levels 9 and 10 are non-lethal and use a basketball or baseball shooter. Levels 17 and 18 are timed and you must hit the pins before the time runs out.

Artillery Bowling has 21 formations of enemies marching or crewing on pirate ships to strike with different weapons. Switch between drones, catapults, .50 caliber machine guns, cannons, and ballistae. Use "reload" to switch between flaming arrows and explosive arrows on the ballista. Use "reload" to switch between cannonballs and cannon shots with the cannon. Drones can replenish grenades to the refueling platform. Bowling scoring is done when all 21 fantasy formations or pirate crew record a score based on the number of shots or dummies destroyed. Bonus for each original redneck mannequin saved. A new redneck dummy will spawn causing penalties if 4 to 5 original dummies are hit at sea or on land. Your drone, catapult, 50 caliber machine guns, cannons, and ballistae can be damaged with a time limit penalty depending on the difficulty of the level. Less than -10000 score ends the game. The hit rate improves your score. You have unlimited ammo.


Arena Bowling - Hit the pins in an unusual Bowling Arena. (Lethal Game)
Level 1 - Ranch Bowling
Level 2 - Tornado Bowling
Level 3 - Monster Bowling
Level 4 - Bowling Troll Winter
Level 5 - Bowling Twilight of Halloween
Level 6 - Bowling Halloween Night
Level 7 - T-Rex Bowling
Level 8 – Bowling Dinosaurs

Arena Bowling - Hit the pins in an unusual Bowling Arena. (Non-Lethal Game)
Level 9 - Basketball Bowling
Level 10 - Swamp Bowling

Artillery Bowling - Hit the formation of attackers.
Level 11 - Medieval Fantasy Bowling
Level 12 - Zombie Bowling
Level 13 - Fort Red Pirate Bowling
Level 14 - Dead Red Island
Level 15 - Red Castle
Level 16 - Red's Last Stand

Arena Bowling - Hit the pins in an unusual Timed Bowling Arena. (Lethal Game)
Level 17 - Monster Mash Countdown Bowl
Level 18 - Lightning Round Countdown Bowl

Practice Indoor Range
Practice Outdoor Range

content_descriptors.notes: Domestic animals are victimized, and different Deer season or rabbit seasons.  Choose between different ammunition and arrows plus different handguns, rifles, a shotgun, a bow, and crossbows.

Bowling without the bowling ball is both lethal and non-lethal.

With the Arena game you have a bowling score and a game score. Earn bonus shots to use against other targets. The Hillbilly level is expert, and Redneck is an easier level given the number of increased possibilities. There are several targets to hit, and you need to be careful of pets as it will count against you if they get hit. Deer season or rabbit season is earned by hitting tires or silhouettes in the center. The squirrel bag limit increases with the number of shots or replacements. Levels 9 and 10 are non-lethal and use a basketball or baseball shooter. Levels 17 and 18 are timed and you must hit the pins before the time runs out.

Your drone, catapult, 50 caliber machine guns, cannons, and ballistae can be damaged with a time limit penalty depending on the difficulty of the level. Less than -10000 score ends the game. name: Redneck Bowl Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or faster with 2 or more cores
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 12 Desktop
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Base system audio
  • Additional Notes: Game controllers works well with keyboard and mouse plus gamepad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bowling without the bowling ball both lethal and non-lethal play in unusual Bowling Arenas.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
